name: Cal.com Companion Apps
tagline: Native iOS & Android App + Browser Extensions for scheduling
description: After 4 years and many customer requests we are finally launching our native iOS and Android apps + Browser Extensions for Google Chrome, Firefox, Safari and Edge

name: TeamOut AI
tagline: The AI that plans your events
description: TeamOut is the first AI copilot for planning team offsites and corporate events. Instantly get tailored property recommendations, flight cost estimates, and exclusive hotel deals that save you up to 40 percent. No waiting, no planners, just smarter planning in minutes. Whether you are organizing a company retreat or a team gathering, TeamOut helps you go from idea to booked faster and easier than ever before. Perfect for remote teams and fast-moving startups.

name: AI Test Engineer by BlinqIO
tagline: Playwright code + self-healing tests w/ no vendor lock-in
description: BlinqIOâ€™s AI Test Engineer builds and maintains Playwright automation in minutes - generating real code in your repo, integrating with CI/CD, and self-healing when your app changes. No lock-in, just faster, stable, zero-touch testing.

name: folk Assistants
tagline: Sales Assistants working 24/7 to help you close more deals
description: folk assistants proactively take action from your CRM. They research companies, send outreach emails, recap ongoing deals, and identify who to follow up with.

name: Kiki for Mac
tagline: The accountability monster that keeps you focused on a task
description: look, we both know how this goes. you sit down to work. you check one thing. then it's been 40 minutes and you're watching a guy restore a rusty knife on youtube. ã€°ã€° kiki lives on your mac and helps you actually finish the things you start. choose your focus. pick your apps. hit start. kiki works alongside you, typing away in the corner. ã€°ã€° get distracted and kiki has opinions. flips your lights. sets things on fire. focus and you might just finish that project you've been avoiding.

name: Indy
tagline: AI support for your ADHD, not just your to-do list
description: Indy is a free, AI-powered ADHD support app designed for how ADHD brains actually work. Informed by behavioral science and insights from 80,000+ coaching sessions, Indy uses adaptive systems and structured prompts to help you stay connected to what matters through future-mapping, daily scaffolding, and guided reflection.

name: Binary
tagline: Hiring software that is fast, simple and AI powered
description: Binary is a new-age ATS built for those who want something simple yet powerful. It comes with a free forever plan that supports unlimited jobs and unlimited candidates.

name: LyzrGPT
tagline: Private, secure & model-agnostic AI chat for enterprises
description: LyzrGPT is a private, enterprise-grade AI chat platform built for security-first teams. Deploy it inside your own ecosystem to keep data fully private. Switch between multiple AI models like OpenAI and Anthropic in the same conversation, avoid vendor lock-in, and retain secure contextual memory across sessions. Built for enterprises and regulated industries.

name: GitHub Space Shooter
tagline: Visualizes GitHub contribution graphs as a Space Shooter
description: The project does not solve any problem. But just turn your github contribution graph into a space shooter battle field ðŸš€. You can either use the web app for a one time generation or use the github action for a schedule based generation.

name: Cursor AI Mobile
tagline: Ð¡ontrol Cursor AI directly from your iPhone
description: Access your AI coding assistant anywhere with Cursor Mobile - the companion app for Cursor IDE on iPhone and iPad. Send prompts from your device that run instantly on your Mac through the Cursor CLI, with results and chat history syncing back in real time for a continuous workflow.

name: Notto
tagline: AI dictation, meeting notes & invisible chat overlay
description: The invisible AI overlay for your desktop. Transcribe meetings, dictate text and chat with your notes without switching apps. Works anywhere you do.

name: Manus Meeting Minutes
tagline: From in-person meeting to finished work in one flow
description: Introducing Meeting Minutesâ€”record in-person meetings, get AI-powered summaries with speaker recognition, and turn discussions into presentations, websites, and deliverables in one seamless workflow.

name: StackPatch
tagline: Patch authentication into your Next.js app with one command
description: StackPatch is a CLI that patches production-ready authentication into Next.js projects. Run one command and get Google & GitHub auth, protected routes, and session handling all as real files inside your repo. -No SaaS -No lock-in -Fully open source.

name: Hal9
tagline: Launch AI-Powered Products in 30 Days
description: Hal9 helps non-technical founders launch AI-powered products in 30 days without expensive teams or endless AI prompts. Instead of vibe-coding alone with robots, talk to our AI experts who scope your vision, refine ideas, guide AI agents to build secure scalable MVPs on our platform. It's the most competitive way to ship AI MVPs: experts guide (don't code from scratch), AI handles the heavy lifting, predictable pricing, no lock-in, full customization. Focus on growth while we handle the tech.

name: AI dication by Snaply
tagline: Free, 100% local, AI dictation for Mac
description: Stop typing and just speak. Snaply brings instant AI dictation to every app and website on your Mac. Because it runs 100% locally on-device, your data remains completely private.ðŸ”’ Best of all? Itâ€™s entirely free for individuals.ðŸ’°

name: Flowdy
tagline: Turn product descriptions into shoppable links automatically
description: Turn content into shoppable links. Flowdy uses AI to highlight keywords in your blogs and descriptions automatically. Most readers leave without buying. Flowdy fixes this. When clicked, instant product recommendations appearâ€”boosting conversion without page reloads. Why Flowdy? âš¡ Zero Friction: Shop seamlessly while reading ðŸ§  Neural Flow: Personalized suggestions based on browsing history ðŸ“ˆ Monetize Content: Track revenue per keyword Turn readers into buyers today.

name: WizzyPoke
tagline: Instant vibration alerts across all browser tabs.
description: WizzyPoke is a browser extension that lets you send subtle screen shake to get someoneâ€™s attention when they miss your message. After pairing with a simple 6-digit code, you can send a nudge that triggers a vibration style screen shake with sound, even if theyâ€™re on another tab or website. Works across all tabs from messaging apps to video sites without accounts or logins. The free version includes limited daily nudges, with an optional premium upgrade for unlimited use.

name: AI Mode API
tagline: Query Googleâ€™s AI Mode as a simple, programmable API
description: What it does: Turns Google's AI Mode into a programmable API endpoint that runs through your browser. Install the extension, get an API URL, and start querying AI Mode from anywhereâ€”your terminal, scripts, automation tools, whatever. What you get back: Every response includes the AI-generated answer, follow-up questions, and source links. All structured as JSON. No scraping setup, no complex tooling.

name: GROOVY
tagline: Universal Search and Signaling across LLMs
description: "We are outperforming ourselves thanks to AI by at least 1.5x in anything knowledge work related now. Coding, sales, marketing, growth, funding, law, taxes. You can get very competent very fast. The main problem with AI tools right now is that most of them donâ€™t let you reach flow state. You have to wait after prompting and youâ€™re constantly context switching." - @yasser_elsaid_ Groovy is a unified dashboard for all your AI agents. Offering you universal search and signaling across LLMs.

name: Writizzy
tagline: Just you and you words. Nothing else.
description: It's just a blog. Your blog. Imagine WordPress, but without the annoying plugins and complicated hosting Imagine Medium, but without lock-in, and on your own site Imagine Substack, but with good UX Imagine Ghost, but that doesn't cost an arm and a leg That's what we're building with Writizzy, your new blogging platform.
